meanings.definition: To attend an event or gathering with someone else.
meanings.sent1: I will coattend the party with my friend.
meanings.sent3: My friend and I coattend parties like a dynamic duo.
meanings.sent4: Our friendship is so strong, we coattend events like two peas in a pod.
meanings.sent5: Coattending events with friends makes the experience more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: To be present at the same event or gathering as someone else.
meanings.sent3: Coattending events with friends is always a blast.
meanings.sent4: We coattend events like synchronized swimmers.
meanings.sent5: Coattending ensures we don't miss out on the fun.
